name: Aryan's FPS
description:
Aryan's FPS is a prototype game I made I'm not sure why. I just want to have a quick record of it and stuff. Source Code coming soon!

Now we come to what I want the game to be. I want it to be as generic FPS. I probably would want multiplayer because that would be fun.

I was bored of so many games with just moving forward. Backward. Sideways Then they call that many options of moving. I wanted a game with Karlson like movement that still had a ring of seriousness to it besides getting milk.(Milk is godlike tho)

So yeah there you go.

AND NO THIS IS NOT A KARLSON CLONE. THIS IS MY OWN MOVEMENT SYSTEM INSPIRED BY KARLSON AND WITH A WHOLE OTHER PLOT. KARLSON DID NOT INVENT VERSATILITY.

UPDATE:

ENEMIES, INFINITE LEVELS, AND MORE (only windows for now)
